SAINT.Name: Wednesday of the Second Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: O Thou Most High Who dwellest in the heavens, Creator of every breath, save us, O God: for we have hoped in Thee, O our Savior.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 5th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Unto Thee, O Lord, will I cry
and unto My God will I make supplication.
SEXTE.STICHOS: I will exalt Thee, O Lord, for Thou hast upheld me.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: In Thee, O Lord, have I hoped
let me not be put to shame in the age to come.
SEXTE.STICHOS: In Thy righteousness deliver me, and rescue me.
